long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- You can easily keep track of your daily time entries.
- See how much hours you spend today, yesterday, this week and this month.
- Find out your person-day rate.
- You can access the editing page of time entry with a single click.

Source: https://github.com/guvensahin/redmine-tte-extension
